content:
copied from https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1476983 ...

"We use Thunderbird as our e-mail client on multiple computers. We also have multiple e-mail providers. On one of our computers we can receive but not send in one of the verizon.net e-mails configured in Thunderbird. All of the critical outgoing settings, are the same except for the e-mail address, Description: Verizon Online, Sever Name smtp.verizon.net, Port 465 Connection Security Normal Password, user name different for each account. I have looked around on the Web and not found any solutions that worked. Thanks very much."
creator: wsmwk

content:
Hi Thierry, check out the steps in the following article:

How to disable or change the Thunderbird start page

Does that allow you to change to a page you prefer?
creator: jscher2000

content: You'll want to unsubscribe from "All Mail" folder.
creator: wsmwk

content: Puoi usare una estensione come Remove Duplicate Messages (Alternate) -> https://addons.thunderbird.net/it/thunderbird/addon/removedupes/
creator: @next

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
creator: @next

content: Wilt u het vanuit uw scansoftware verzenden of als bijlage in een mail die u opstelt in Thunderbird?
creator: Mad_Maks
